mainTask: Write an article on benefits of meditation

agents.agentName: Agent for Research the benefits of meditation (stress reduction, improved focus, emotional regulation, etc.)
agents.taskAssigned: Research the benefits of meditation (stress reduction, improved focus, emotional regulation, etc.)

agents.agentName: Agent for Find supporting evidence and credible sources (studies, expert opinions, etc.)
agents.taskAssigned: Find supporting evidence and credible sources (studies, expert opinions, etc.)

agents.agentName: Agent for Create an outline for the article (introduction, body paragraphs, conclusion)
agents.taskAssigned: Create an outline for the article (introduction, body paragraphs, conclusion)

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the introduction (hook, background information, thesis statement)
agents.taskAssigned: Write the introduction (hook, background information, thesis statement)

agents.agentName: Agent for Write body paragraphs (each focusing on a specific benefit, with supporting evidence)
agents.taskAssigned: Write body paragraphs (each focusing on a specific benefit, with supporting evidence)

agents.agentName: Agent for Write the conclusion (summarize main points, restate thesis, call to action)
agents.taskAssigned: Write the conclusion (summarize main points, restate thesis, call to action)

agents.agentName: Agent for Edit and proofread the article for grammar, spelling, and clarity
agents.taskAssigned: Edit and proofread the article for grammar, spelling, and clarity

agents.agentName: Agent for Choose relevant images or illustrations (optional)
Agent for Format the article for publication (headings, subheadings, citations)
agents.taskAssigned: Format the article for publication (headings, subheadings, citations)
